page.title: 06GAMES WE PLAY
page.content:
{ School Games.}
At school we play cricket,rounders, football, hockey and rugby. We play hockey indoors and its called floor hockey but it's quite like normal or ice hockey.When we play cricket we can play by two different sets of rules.In one game you start at { { 200}and lose {6} each time you're out but you still bat for limited amount of overs.In the other game you start at nought and lose {1}run each time you're out,but you still stay in. {Games at home { { }At home I play on my computer. My best game is {DUKES OF HAZZARD.}I also play chase on my{B.M.X.bike.} My dad and I play snooker and darts.
